author: AnimeMan127

text: Rare didn't sell out, they were sold by Nintendo who no longer wanted them so they were grabbed up by Microsoft. They're not a giant like EA or Activision, so pairing up with Microsoft allows them to create the types of games they like without having to worry about poor sales because they have big daddy Microsoft to back them up.
